attributes.action: Give every UK citizen £100,000, rather than spend £50 billion on a bank buy out
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe the British people are best equipped to spend the planned £50 billion bailout.
We can then decide how to invest our £100,000  in company shares, saving account or spend.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
